divs: Sighting DetailsWent to take my dogs outside this evening and i noticed the moon was glowing extra bright this evening. I looked up and noticed an object of light that started to appear while traveling South East, the closer it got too the moon the brighter the object got. Once the object got across the moon the light began to fade until I couldnt see it anymore, seemed like it just disappeared out of no where the same way it appeared to me at first.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hoffman Estates
There were no other sightings in Hoffman Estates on or around September 14th 2013
Summary: Light appeared traveled across the moon then faded.
